name: Hero Strike 3D
description:
Hero Strike is a fun and addictive game where you have to defeat the villain.

Become the hero you've always dreamed of and stop the villain from destroying the city! Earn money for the damage you give and the distance you travel with them.

Make sure you keep going until they are defeated. How many villains can you take down?

Hero Strike features:
- Simple and fun gameplay
- Become a superhero
- Colorful art
- Increasingly challenging enemies
